a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile," said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web. The company also announced that starting April 4, Larry Page, Google Co-Founder, will take charge of company's day-to-day operations as CEO. Eric Schmidt will assume the role of Executive Chairman.

been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star. "Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up," Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will. Except in the last quarter. Elgin Baylor guess they felt like they had to do something. By then, it was too late. Allen Iverson reached 40 points against the Bucks for the sixth time in his career, his most against any opponent. He had 40 and 54 points in his previous two games

same dark career path Michael Vick or Tiger Woods ventured onto but since his return, the 28-year-old has been a model NFL citizen. " Ben Roethlisberger has done a great job," Steelers owner Dan Rooney told FOXSports.com. Ben Roethlisberger did his time. "He did everything he was asked to do. He conducted himself as a real gentleman. "I'm very proud of him. I think he's going to be( regarded as) a fine person to the world as time goes on. It has been a season of redemption for Ben Roethlisberger , who has not only won games but won back many of the fans, team mates and a city that had turned their backs on him.
